entries.journal_entry_description: A particularly skilled and tenacious group of Gotal hunters have found their way to the lowest levels of the Rryatt Trail. Make them the prey as you hunt them.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: A particularly skilled and tenacious group of Gotal hunters has set up camp on the lowest levels of the Rryatt Trail. Tressk wants you to make them hunted instead of hunters by defeating 18 of them.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Defeat the Gotal Hunters on the Rryatt Trail
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Tressk and let him know the Gotal hunters are not as fierce as rumor might suggest.
